wikipedia_page.main: Harold John Parlett (born 19 April 1925) is a British former track and field athlete who competed in the 1948 Summer Olympics. He was born in Bromley, Greater London.

link_mentions.page: Great Britain at the 1948 Summer Olympics

response: Manley married twice, first in 1949 to Peter Hall, who died in 1973, and then in 1979 to John Parlett, a middle-distance runner she knew from the 1948 Olympics. In 2012 Manley had three children, five grandchildren, and 16 great-grandchildren.Kleebauer, Alistair (6 May 2012) Woodford Green Olympian recalls storming to silver in 100m final of 1948 London Games. ilfordrecorder.co.uk
